description: Delete a job production plan alarm subscriber.

flags.name: confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to true to proceed.

permissions: Allowed via JobProductionPlanAlarmSubscriberPolicy and delegated to the related job production plan alarm; the alarm policy allows create/destroy/update when the user has update permission on the related job production plan.
side_effects: Deletes a job production plan alarm subscriber record.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. --confirm must be set to delete.
